name: Poggers
description:
Take control of Bun-Bun Poggers the adorable bunny rabbit in this classic retro arcade game where the goal is to cross a dangerous field of cobras and then cross a wide river by jumping on floating logs to get him home! Bun-Bun Poggers has the ability to collect carrot power-ups which can reverse the usual roles of predator and prey and give Bun-Bun the opportunity to score some massive bonus points!

Get all six bunnies home, and the level will advance as well as the speed and challenge of the game!
